err.http: Server or network errors. Please try again later.
err.username: Username must contain 6 - 64 characters and must contain only letters, digits, underscores

home.headLn1: You spend too much on cloud compute resources.
home.headLn2: We help you find out and save.
home.bnftSub: iCloudObject maximizes your computing resource utilization and reduces your total data center cost.
home.bnftOpSub: Manage your cloud computing resources through a holistic view of infrastructure configuration, process statistics.
home.bnftResSub: Improve your resource efficiency in the cloud and save money through fine-grained consumption monitoring.
home.solSub: iCloudObject offers a fine-grained resource consumption monitoring solution, big data analysis, to help our customer to save on resource utilization.
home.solMeasureSub: Our light weight ICO agent will collect process usage information, such usage patterns are discovered and presented to our customer in a holistic view.
home.solAnalyzeSub: Our ICO big data analizer will analyze the usage pattern, present the resource reduction strategies to our customer.
home.solSaveSub: Our Ico solution works for you every minutes to allow you run less number of computes.

setup.agentIntro: ICO Agent is a Java SE application that periodically collects resource usage data of the top processes on your cloud-based hosts/instances. These data will be used by the ICO Optimizer to develop optimal cost saving plans for your cloud tenancy.
setup.agentInstCmd: To install the ICO Agent as a service on your host/instance:
setup.agentInstErr: Failed to initialize agent download/install instruction. Please try again later.

dash.noAgentData: It seems you haven't installed any ICO Agent yet, and the dashboard data is not ready.
